condition: [AND]([NEQ](<*VALUE(PLC_UOC_BOM_Items)*>,),[LIKE](<*CTX( Container(MSID_Product_Container).UniqueValues(Product Name).Separator(,) )*>,3rd Party PLC to ControlEdge PLC/UOC))
